dcmIDGeneratorName.title: ID Generator Name
dcmIDGeneratorName.description: ID Generator Name. Enumerated values: PatientID, AccessionNumber, RequestedProcedureID, ScheduledProcedureStepID

dcmIDGeneratorFormat.title: ID Generator Format
dcmIDGeneratorFormat.description: Format string used by this ID Generator. %0<width>d will be replaced by a sequential number with leading zeros according the given width

dcmIDGeneratorInitialValue.title: ID Generator Initial Value
dcmIDGeneratorInitialValue.description: Initial value for sequence used by this ID Generator; 1 if absent
